detail_desc: Cardigan in a soft, thin, fine knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and patch front pockets. No buttons.
Cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool. Slightly longer style with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves, patch front pockets and narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool. Slightly longer style with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves, patch front pockets and narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.

Jumper in a soft knit with a round neck, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft knit with a round neck, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft knit with a round neck, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft knit with a round neck, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Non-padded bra in microfibre with underwired, lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Non-padded bra in microfibre with underwired, lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Set with a T-shirt in jersey and pair of shorts in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric. T-shirt with a ribbed trim around the neckline and visible seams around the sleeves and hem. Shorts with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and a back pocket.

Set with a T-shirt in jersey and pair of shorts in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric. T-shirt with a ribbed trim around the neckline and visible seams around the sleeves and hem. Shorts with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and a back pocket.

Two pairs of pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey, one pair with a T-shirt and pair of shorts, the other pair with a long-sleeved top and long-legged bottoms. Tops with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Shorts and bottoms with covered elastication at the waist.
Jumper in a soft, textured cotton knit with buttons on one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and narrow ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, textured cotton knit with buttons on one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and narrow ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with laser-cut scalloped edges and a high cut at the back.
Calf-length lace dress that can also be worn as a cardigan. V-neck, covered buttons down the front, short, wide sleeves, a seam with a lace band at the waist, and a scalloped hem. Unlined.
Blouse in crinkled satin with a small collar and V-neck opening with a concealed button at the front. Gathered shoulder seams, a gathered yoke at the back and long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs.
Blouse in crinkled satin with a small collar and V-neck opening with a concealed button at the front. Gathered shoulder seams, a gathered yoke at the back and long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs.

Long tunic in airy chiffon with broderie anglaise. V-neck with buttons at the front and short sleeves with a drawstring at the hems for a gently draped effect. Seams with a crocheted band at the waist and over the knees. Open at the bottom. Unlined.

Short dress in chiffon and flock-print mesh. Round neckline with an opening and ties at the front and long puff sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Seam at the waist with a small frill trim and gathered tiers on the skirt for added width and soft draping. Partly lined in jersey.

Short dress in chiffon and flock-print mesh. Round neckline with an opening and ties at the front and long puff sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Seam at the waist with a small frill trim and gathered tiers on the skirt for added width and soft draping. Partly lined in jersey.

Cold shoulder blouse in an embroidered cotton weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a frill trim at the top and short sleeves. Wide smocking at the waist and a peplum at the hem. Overlocked trims in a contrasting colour.

Playsuit in a crinkled weave with small frill trims. Deep V-neck front and back with wide ties at the back. Seam under the bust and at the back of the waist. Long sleeves with smocking at the cuffs, and short, wide legs. Lined.

Playsuit in a crinkled weave with small frill trims. Deep V-neck front and back with wide ties at the back. Seam under the bust and at the back of the waist. Long sleeves with smocking at the cuffs, and short, wide legs. Lined.
Running cap in woven fabric with a soft terry sweatband inside and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Running cap in woven fabric with a soft terry sweatband inside and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Biker jacket in soft imitation leather with quilted sections over the shoulders, notch lapels with decorative press-studs, and a diagonal zip down the front. Lined.
Block-coloured cardigan in soft, textured-knit cotton with buttons down the front, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Leggings in soft, stretch cotton jersey with a high, elasticated waist and flared hems.
Leggings in soft, stretch cotton jersey with a high, elasticated waist and flared hems.

Jacket in water-repellent functional fabric with an all-over print. Detachable, lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Front pockets and covered elastication at the cuffs. Lined.

Jacket in water-repellent functional fabric with an all-over print. Detachable, lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Front pockets and covered elastication at the cuffs. Lined.
Satin-covered Alice band with glittery, shell-shaped appliqués on top and wavy hair extensions at the sides.
Sunglasses with plastic and metal frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Sunglasses with plastic and metal frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Retro-look sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Set of two best friend necklaces made from thin metal chain, each with a pendant. Together, the pendants form a heart.
Thin metal chain necklace with a glittery plastic pendant. Adjustable length.
Short, tiered skirt in a crêpe weave. High waist with wide smocking, and a decorative lace trim and small frill trim at the top. Unlined.

Jumpsuit in soft organic cotton jersey with an opening and button at the back of the neck and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and straight legs.

Fully lined, crinkled swimsuit with high-cut legs and medium coverage at the back. The polyester content of the swimsuit is partly recycled.
Sleeveless top in soft, ribbed jersey with wrapover draping at the front and a practical inner top for easier nursing access.

Long nursing dress in a cotton weave with short, jersey-lined balloon sleeves and a wrapover top with long ties. Seam at the waist with concealed elastication and a flared skirt that has a flared tier to the hem. Soft inner top for easier nursing access. Unlined.
Sleeveless top in soft cotton jersey with a woven shirt front. Collar, button placket and extra-deep armholes for easier nursing access.
